channel.title: My appearance on the “First 10” podcast
channel.description:
The “First 10” podcast has an interesting premise:
> The [First 10 Podcast](https://www.conormccarthy.me/podcast) interviews business builders on their First 10 Customers - who they were, how they found them, and what effect they had on their business, so that you can learn what worked, and what didn’t.
I had the opportunity to be a guest on the most recent episode. I talked about how I got the first 10 post-acquisition customers for [Saber Feedback](https://saberfeedback.com/):
https://www.conormccarthy.me/podcast-episodes/episode-19-steve-mcleod

item.title: My appearance on the “First 10” podcast
item.dc:creator: unboot
item.description:
@SteveMcLeod In the podcast there was a discussion about SaaS marketing books. I think you mentioned “Traction” by Gabriel Weinberg. One other book, which I think is even more valuable is “Roadmap to Revenue” by K. Zhivago. The thing is, it turns the question of marketing around, from: How can I market to my customers? To: How do my customers want to buy?
